module xor_gate(input wire [1:0] i, output wire [0:0] o);
   wire [0:0] od;
   assign o = od[0:0];
   assign od = kernel_xor_gate(i);
   function [0:0] kernel_xor_gate(input reg [1:0] arg_0);
         reg [1:0] r0;
         reg [0:0] r1;
         reg [0:0] r2;
         reg [0:0] r3;
         begin
            r0 = arg_0;
            r1 = r0[0:0];
            r2 = r0[1:1];
            r3 = r1 ^ r2;
            kernel_xor_gate = r3;
         end
   endfunction
endmodule
